20101223180925.000|20101223180927.000|CC1|THIS A REPEATED PATTERN WITH    
20101223180927.000|20101223180928.000|CC1|THIS GUY?

20101223182210.000|20101223182210.000|CC1|  [ Male Announcer ] ASPIRIN IS

20101223182219.000|20101223182219.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] BE READY  
20101223182219.000|20101223182221.000|CC1|   IF A HEART ATTACK STRIKES.   
20101223182221.000|20101223182221.000|CC1|     DONATE $5 TO WomenHeart    
20101223182221.000|20101223182225.000|CC1|       AT IamProHeart.com,      
20101223182225.000|20101223182225.000|CC1|        AND WE'LL SEND YOU      
20101223182225.000|20101223182228.000|CC1|  THIS Bayer Aspirin PILL TOTE. 
20101223182228.000|20101223182228.000|CC1|   [ Male Announcer ] If you've 
20101223182228.000|20101223182229.000|CC1|   had a heart attack caused by 
20101223182229.000|20101223182231.000|CC1|   a completely blocked artery, 
20101223182231.000|20101223182231.000|CC1|  another heart attack could be 
20101223182231.000|20101223182235.000|CC1|   lurking, waiting to strike.  
20101223182235.000|20101223182235.000|CC1|          A heart attack        
20101223182235.000|20101223182237.000|CC1|     that's caused by a clot,   
20101223182237.000|20101223182239.000|CC1|     one that could be fatal.   
20101223182239.000|20101223182241.000|CC1|   But PLAVIX helps save lives. 
20101223182241.000|20101223182241.000|CC1|        PLAVIX, taken with      
20101223182241.000|20101223182243.000|CC1|      other heart medicines,    
20101223182243.000|20101223182243.000|CC1|      goes beyond what other    
20101223182243.000|20101223182245.000|CC1|    heart medicines do alone,   
20101223182245.000|20101223182245.000|CC1|  to provide greater protection 
20101223182245.000|20101223182247.000|CC1|       against heart attack     
20101223182247.000|20101223182249.000|CC1|     or stroke and even death   
20101223182249.000|20101223182249.000|CC1|            by helping          
20101223182249.000|20101223182251.000|CC1|     to keep blood platelets    
20101223182251.000|20101223182251.000|CC1|      from sticking together    
20101223182251.000|20101223182253.000|CC1|   and forming dangerous clots. 
20101223182253.000|20101223182253.000|CC1|         Ask your doctor        
20101223182253.000|20101223182256.000|CC1|   if PLAVIX is right for you.  
20101223182256.000|20101223182256.000|CC1|      Protection that helps     
20101223182256.000|20101223182259.000|CC1|           save lives.          
20101223182259.000|20101223182259.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20101223182259.000|20101223182301.000|CC1|     Certain genetic factors    
20101223182301.000|20101223182301.000|CC1|       and some medicines,      
20101223182301.000|20101223182302.000|CC1|        such as Prilosec,       
20101223182302.000|20101223182304.000|CC1|   reduce the effect of PLAVIX  
20101223182304.000|20101223182304.000|CC1|   leaving you at greater risk  
20101223182304.000|20101223182306.000|CC1|   for heart attack and stroke. 
20101223182306.000|20101223182306.000|CC1|       Your doctor may use      
20101223182306.000|20101223182308.000|CC1|          genetic tests         
20101223182308.000|20101223182309.000|CC1|     to determine treatment.    
20101223182309.000|20101223182309.000|CC1|     Don't stop taking PLAVIX   
20101223182309.000|20101223182311.000|CC1|  without talking to your doctor
20101223182311.000|20101223182311.000|CC1|   as your risk of heart attack 
20101223182311.000|20101223182314.000|CC1|     or stroke may increase.    
20101223182314.000|20101223182314.000|CC1|  People with stomach ulcers or 
20101223182314.000|20101223182316.000|CC1|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101223182316.000|20101223182317.000|CC1|      should not use PLAVIX.    
20101223182317.000|20101223182317.000|CC1|       Taking PLAVIX alone      
20101223182317.000|20101223182320.000|CC1|  or with some other medicines, 
20101223182320.000|20101223182320.000|CC1|        including aspirin,      
20101223182320.000|20101223182322.000|CC1|   may increase bleeding risk,  
20101223182322.000|20101223182322.000|CC1|       so tell your doctor      
20101223182322.000|20101223182324.000|CC1|      when planning surgery.    
20101223182324.000|20101223182324.000|CC1|         Tell your doctor       
20101223182324.000|20101223182326.000|CC1|     all medicines you take,    
20101223182326.000|20101223182326.000|CC1|  including aspirin, especially 
20101223182326.000|20101223182328.000|CC1|     if you've had a stroke.    
20101223182328.000|20101223182328.000|CC1|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101223182328.000|20101223182331.000|CC1|      or confusion develops,    
20101223182331.000|20101223182332.000|CC1|    tell your doctor promptly.  
20101223182332.000|20101223182334.000|CC1|    These may be signs of TTP,  
20101223182334.000|20101223182334.000|CC1|      a rare but potentially    
20101223182334.000|20101223182336.000|CC1|   life-threatening condition,  
20101223182336.000|20101223182336.000|CC1|   reported sometimes less than 
20101223182336.000|20101223182339.000|CC1|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20101223182339.000|20101223182339.000|CC1|     Other rare but serious     
20101223182339.000|20101223182436.000|CC1|     side effects may occur.
